entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 7:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. 30 percent chance of showers near Duncan early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
